title: WILLIAM BOYD JONES
maintext: WILLIAM BOYD JONES, 71, of Vinton, Ohio, died January 2 at home. Funeral service will be 1 p.m. Saturday, Willis Funeral Home, Gallipolis, Ohio; burial will follow in Victory Cemetery. Visitation will be one hour before service Saturday at the funeral home. www.willisfuneralhome.com.
